installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

# Установка зависимостей
apk add --no-cache git curl nodejs npm openjdk17

cd /mnt/server

# Клонируем бота
rm -rf Discord-MusicBot
git clone https://github.com/SudhanPlayz/Discord-MusicBot.git
cd Discord-MusicBot
npm install

# Скачиваем Lavalink
cd /mnt/server
mkdir lavalink
cd lavalink
curl -L https://github.com/freyacodes/Lavalink/releases/latest/download/Lavalink.jar -o Lavalink.jar

# Создаём application.yml с переменными окружения
cat > application.yml <<EOL
server:
  port: ${SERVER_PORT}
lavalink:
  server:
    password: "${LAVALINK_PASSWORD}"
spring:
  main:
    banner-mode: "off"
EOL

# Стартовый скрипт
cd /mnt/server
cat > start.sh <<'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server/lavalink
java -jar Lavalink.jar &
cd /mnt/server/Discord-MusicBot
npm run deploy || true
node index.js
EOF
chmod +x start.sh
